dict.acceptation: （表示位置）在；因为；（表示方向）在…方面；（表示方式）以…的方式；
阿特（老挝辅币单位，100 阿特 = 1 基普）；

sent.orig: Your presence is requested at a banquet to be given at the Friendship Hotel at 7:30 p.m. of March 2.
sent.trans: 兹定于三月二日晚七时半在友谊宾馆举行宴会，敬请光临。

sent.orig: A test tube is closed at one end and open at the other.
sent.trans: 试管一端封闭，一端开口。

sent.orig: Affronted at his impertinence,she stared at him coldly and wordlessly.
sent.trans: 被他的无礼而冒犯，她冷冷地、无言地盯着他。

sent.orig: After a hard day at work, a nice meal at home is just what the doctor ordered.
sent.trans: 一天的辛苦工作后，家里的一顿美餐正合我意。

sent.orig: After all the briefing sessions at head office,our sales team is at concert pitch.
sent.trans: 在总公司开过各种情况介绍会后，我们全体销售人员都跃跃欲试，准备大干一场。
